step.para: Navigate to AutomateExplorer, navigate to the namespace you want to add a class to.
Type in a unique Name and Description.

If you want to use the schema from a class that has already been created, select it from the Inherits From dropdown. If the class that the new class inherits from changes, the new class will also change.

formalpara.title: Result:
formalpara.para: The new class is created and you can create a schema, add instances and methods.

note.para: For each class, create a schema if you did not choose to inherit from an existing class. The schema can include attributes, methods, assertions, and relationships.
